intro: Lukea, commonly known as the silverleaf tree, is a tropical plant native to parts of Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its large,革质 (leathery) leaves that have a distinctive silvery-gray underside. The plant produces small, fragrant flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. Its roots are known for their medicinal properties, used in traditional remedies. The tree thrives in humid climates and is often found in forested areas.
